title: Low FPS issues are back?!?!?
body:
I recently noticed I am having low fps issues again...
I have a GTX 1060 3GB, i5 7400, 16GB ram, 256GB ssd (league is on ssd) and 1TB of storage.
Ive always had around 140 to 160 FPS but now i don't know why I am getting only around 60 sometimes even 30..
I play on borderless and max setting, I am running a dual monitor setup with a 29 inch ultra wide (main for playing league and other stuff) and a 27 inch.
I have VSync off also tried turning off anti alias but that didn't help.
Ive tried to go into my properties of league and disabeling  full-screen optimisation and some other stuff...
But nothing seems to work but this only happens on league.. on all the other games I play I get a stable 120FPS but league just caps out at 60 and just laggs...
Ive also noticed when I go into game I start off with 144FPS but the it lowers to 60 after about 20seconds.
And my CPU usage just goes to 80 to 100% and my game just laggs while it shoudn't be doing that because my pc isn't bad or anything...
My friend has a pc with an i5 4460 and a GTX 970 and atm he is getting more FPS then me... like WTFFF
Plz someone help me if you can.
I am just done playing league if this is just gonne keep happening.
(Sorry for my trash english)
Thanks in advance,
Kevin aka FluffyNidalee

replies.body: hey, try downloading this software to boost up your performance IO BIT Advanced System Care

> And my CPU usage just goes to 80 to 100% and my game just laggs while it shoudn't be doing that because my pc isn't bad or anything...

This is your problem. Your CPU is actually pretty bad, and 100% usage + crippling lag spikes on 4t i5s is normal. A lot of people are upgrading to 12t CPUs for gaming in the last year.

..Just not in games like LoL, it _should_ be fine on two threads. What is using the CPU resources? Is it entirely the game client?
